alert.note: Alert for Baker; Union (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 08 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of southwestern Baker and northeastern Union Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 645 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower capable of producing a landspout over Lulu, or 10 miles northwest of Lake Butler, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Raiford, Johnstown and Ellerbee. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
